song.title: Goodbye
song.lyrics:
I've got our love to remember that will never change I have you in my head and no, I'll never hold you and I'm still asking why I guess that this is goodbye
my dreams suddenly seem so empty I could go on my own, but I feel like playin' dead and for what feels like the first time I don't know where you are tonight I guess that this is goodbye
we lived half our lives together a hundred years is a lot of weight to bear and the sun, it may be shining there's an ocean in my eyes cause I know that this is goodbye cause I know that this... is goodbye
